name: ThrillPad
description: We help you plan your travel
overview:
ThrillPad aims at being Travel marketplace, providing travel/trip planning solutions.

We help our customers design and execute multi-location itineraries/trips using our trip builder/trip planner wherein he can add destinations, things-to-do, places-to-visit and places to eat.

On the other side, we have a set of passionate people(locals) who offer unique activities and interesting things to do for travelers and tourists.

According to ThrillPad what the customer/Traveler needs is a pre-planned travel experience, he needs an agency, a company who can do all the travel pre-planning for us and execute the same for him/her. We introduce ThrillPad as the company who till take care of all his travel needs. They curate travel experiences.
